The Energize Fitness Center team appreciates your interest in our services. We are constantly working to improve our service and offer a wide variety of workouts and programs to help you achieve your fitness goals. Thank you for choosing us!
pages.about: Energize Fitness Center about Home About us Services Timetable Сontact "Welcome to the world of health and fitness with Energize Fitness Center!" We are a chain of gyms dedicated to your well-being and achieving your fitness goals. At Energize Fitness Center, we strive to create a welcoming and motivating environment where everyone can find workout programs that are right for them and personalized attention to their needs. Our gyms are equipped with state-of-the-art fitness equipment and offer a variety of group exercise classes led by experienced instructors. We are proud of our professional trainers who are committed to helping you create and maintain a healthy lifestyle. Energize Fitness Center is more than just a place to work out, it is a community of people committed to health and fitness. Join us to be a part of this exciting journey to the best version of yourself! Thank you for choosing Energize Fitness Center! Feedback Charles Davis With Energy Fitness Center, I stopped being lazy and became a true athlete! Carl Sullivan Thanks Energy for the new friends, motivation, and awesome workouts! Daniel Reese Energy is not just a gym, it's where champions are born! Russell Smith The Energy made me feel stronger, more confident and happier! Tyler Mitchell Energy Fitness Center is not just a workout, it's a real high and adrenaline! Scott Smith With Energy, I found inspiration, goals and most importantly, myself! Frequently Asked Questions What are the most effective exercises? It will be very good if your workouts include the following exercises: - strength exercises - aerobic exercises - stretching exercises You should allocate at least 2 workouts per week for strength training (gym). The duration of training is 1-1.5 hours. For aerobic exercise is best suited calm running for 20-30 minutes. It is best to run every day, except for strength training days. Attention!!! Running should be done in clean air!!! Is it helpful to feel muscle soreness during and after exercise? "No pain, no growth" was the motto of the past. Exercise should not be painful, and pain is not a sign of a good workout. You may feel muscle soreness after you start working out, but it shouldn't be like that all the time. If pain is present after every workout, it means that you are increasing the load too rapidly. This will not do you any good. What is included in the membership? Get access to workouts, group classes and more! How much time should you eat before working out? You can have a snack an hour before training, but it is better to have a good meal 2-3 hours before training. Training on a full stomach is not only uncomfortable, but also harmful. How to contact us? Our doors and phone numbers are always open for you! We will always be happy to answer your questions - Contacts Why warm up - it's so tedious and useless, isn't it? If you're going to actually work out and not spend time in the gym, warming up is essential. 5-7 minutes on an exercise bike, jump rope or treadmill. Then you can wave your "wings" and legs. pages.privacy-policy: Energize Fitness Center privacy-policy Home About us Services Timetable Сontact Information Collection: Describe what information your site collects, including personal information about users, such as names, e-mail addresses, phone numbers, etc. Uses of the information: Specify the purposes for which the information is collected, such as processing orders, sending mailings, analyzing site usage, etc. Storing the information: Explain how long you will keep the information and how you will keep it secure. Sharing information with third parties: Indicate whether the data collected will be shared with third parties and, if so, for what purpose. Use of cookies and other technologies: Explain what cookies and other technologies are used on your site and for what purposes. User rights: Indicate users' rights with respect to their personal data, including the right to access, rectify, delete, etc. Privacy Policy Updates: Indicate that your privacy policy may change from time to time and what changes will take effect. Contact Information: Provide contact information where users can contact with questions or concerns about your privacy policy. EnergizeFitnessCenter@gmail.com Information Collection: We collect only the data necessary to provide services and improve the user experience. Use of information: Your data is used solely for the purposes specified at the time of collection and is not shared with third parties without your consent, except as required by law. Data protection: We take security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access or loss. Data access and management: You have the right to request access to, amend or delete your data at your request. Consent to Policy: By using our website, you agree to our privacy policy. Contacting us: If you have any questions regarding the processing of your data or our privacy policy, please contact us via our contact details.
